data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Top Down Tokens - Demons
data.detailed_description:
This token pack contains 24 tokens to represent new and horrible demons.

This product is token module containing tokens for use with the Fantasy Ground virtual tabletop. Upon activating the module, the tokens will appear in your Token box for use throughout your game.
data.about_the_game:
This token pack contains 24 tokens to represent new and horrible demons.

This product is token module containing tokens for use with the Fantasy Ground virtual tabletop. Upon activating the module, the tokens will appear in your Token box for use throughout your game.
data.short_description: This token pack contains 24 tokens to represent new and horrible demons. This product is token module containing tokens for use with the Fantasy Ground virtual tabletop. Upon activating the module, the tokens will appear in your Token box for use throughout your game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x or 8x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: n/a
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x or 8x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: n/a
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
